scripts.setup: npm install jsonwebtoken && npm install kafka-node && npm install -g cucumber && npm install
scripts.everything: ./node_modules/.bin/cucumberjs -f pretty features/DSS.feature features/TenancyManagement.feature features/Enrollment.feature features/IDA.feature features/CB-437.feature features/CB-438.feature features/CB-425.feature features/CB-505.feature features/ODA.feature
